doc: Transform your long URLs into concise, shareable links. Our modern URL shortener makes it easy to create and manage shortened URLs for your needs.

invalid_url.title: Invalid URL
invalid_url.description: Please enter a valid URL including http:// or https://

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred while shortening your URL. Please try again.
error.clipboard: Clipboard access not available in your browser.

success.title: Success
success.description: Your URL has been shortened successfully.
success.copy: The shortened URL has been copied to your clipboard.
success.copy_error: Failed to copy URL to clipboard.

card.title: Shorten Your URL
card.description: Enter a long URL below to create a shortened version.
